title: Do you mind if I smoke?
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education

description: Episode of Series "World in action". Investigates the dangers of passive smoking, ie the smoke inhaled by a non-smoker from cigarettes left burning in an ashtray or in someone's hand. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
